summary.span: 為開啟的連接變更目前的資料庫。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中提供的值`databaseName`參數必須是有效的資料庫名稱，目前的執行個體。The value supplied in the `databaseName` parameter must be a valid database name for the current instance.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 這是關閉任何開啟連接的慣用方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回復任何暫止交易。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然後，它會釋放至連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 應用程式可以呼叫一次以上。An application can call more than one time. 會不產生任何例外狀況。No exception is generated. 如果移出範圍，它不封閉。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`，其中的功能相同。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent. 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設定為`true`或`yes`，這也會釋出的實體連接。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection. > [!CAUTION] > 不要呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`上**連線**，則**DataReader**，或在任何其他 managed 的物件`Finalize`類別方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a **Connection**, a **DataReader**, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該僅釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

exception.span: 開啟連接時發生的連接層級錯誤。

span.span: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.

ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 取得或設定用來開啟連接的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.

span.span: The connection string used to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 連接字串的確切內容取決於這個連接的特定資料來源。

span.span: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接字串的確切內容取決於這個連接的特定資料來源。The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection. 若要判斷哪一個設定有效，請參閱您使用的連接特定類型的文件。To determine which settings are valid, see the documentation for the specific type of connection that you are using.

summary.span: 取得要連接的資料庫伺服器名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 要連接的資料庫伺服器名稱。

span.span: The name of the database server to which to connect.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料庫的連接已關閉，中包含的任何會傳回如`DataSource`關鍵字。If the connection to the database is closed, the returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword. 如果連接已開啟並資料來源關鍵字的值開頭 」|`datadirectory`|"，屬性會傳回中包含的任何的`DataSource`關鍵字只。If the connection is open and the data source keyword's value starts with "|`datadirectory`|", the property returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword only. 如果資料庫的連接已開啟，這個屬性會傳回原生提供者傳回的`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`，而且如果是空的、 原生提供者的`DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`會傳回。If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`, and if that is empty, the native provider's `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed
abstract member EnlistTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction -> unit override this.EnlistTransaction : System.Transactions.Transaction -> unit

param.name: transaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 登記指定的交易。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 ADO.NET 2.0 中是支援的使用`EnlistTransaction`編列到分散式交易中的方法。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the `EnlistTransaction` method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請`EnlistTransaction`善用可用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, `EnlistTransaction` takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions. 一旦在交易中明確地登記連接，它無法取消登錄或另一個交易中登記，直到第一筆交易完成為止。Once a connection is explicitly enlisted in a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.

span.span: Transactions (ADO.NET)
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);

Public Overridable Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: virtual System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);
abstract member GetSchema : string * string[] -> System.Data.DataTable override this.GetSchema : string * string[] -> System.Data.DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要傳回之結構描述的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 指定所要求之結構描述的限制值集合。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 使用結構描述名稱的特定字串和限制值的特定字串陣列，傳回這個 的資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`可以提供參數*n*深度的特定集合的限制集合所指定的值。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要設定特定的限制值及未設定其他限制的值，您需要設定設為 null，然後放入您想要為指定值的限制中的適當值的上述限制。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 這個範例是"Tables"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合中有三個的限制 （資料庫、 擁有者，以及資料表名稱），而且您想要取回只有資料表擁有者 」 Carl 」 相關聯，您必須傳遞下列值至少： null、 「 Carl 」。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name) and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you must pass in the following values at least: null, "Carl". 如果不傳入的限制值，預設值會用於這項限制中。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 這是相同的對應為 null，傳入不同的參數值為空字串傳遞。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在此情況下，則為空字串 ("") 會被視為指定參數的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 如果連線是與交易相關聯，則執行`GetSchema`呼叫可能會造成某些提供者擲回例外狀況。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

span.span: is specified as null.

summary.span: 使用 所指定的設定，開啟資料庫連接。

span.span: Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須覆寫此方法，以使用使用者定義的行為。This method must be overridden with user-defined behavior. 將會擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫一次而不先關閉。 will throw an exception if called again without first being closed.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview
An error occurred while opening the connection.

summary.span: 此方法會實作非同步版本的 。

span.span: This method implements an asynchronous version of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 非同步版本的 ，這個版本會透過 所指定的設定開啟資料庫連接。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

summary.span: 這個方法會叫用虛擬方法 與 CancellationToken.None。

span.span: This method invokes the virtual method with CancellationToken.None.

returns.span: 表示非同步作業的工作。

span.span: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後呼叫，必須傳回直到傳回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然後，連接成功，則必須傳回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果連線失敗，必須傳回。If the connection fails, must return . 呼叫會嘗試取消或關閉對應呼叫。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 如需有關在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

span.span: The cancellation token can optionally be honored.

summary.span: 預設實作會叫用同步呼叫並傳回完成的工作。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous call and returns a completed task.

summary.span: 如果傳遞一個已經被取消的 cancellationToken，預設實作會傳回已取消的工作。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.

summary.span: Open 擲回的例外狀況會透過傳回的工作例外狀況屬性來傳送。

span.span: Exceptions thrown by Open will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在傳回的工作完成之前，不叫用 物件的其他方法及屬性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.

returns.span: 表示非同步作業的工作。

span.span: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後呼叫，必須傳回直到傳回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然後，連接成功，則必須傳回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果連線失敗，必須傳回。If the connection fails, must return . 呼叫會嘗試取消或關閉對應呼叫。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 如需有關在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
